headline: Johnson Controls International (JCI) Appoints Chris Scalia As New Chief Human Resources Officer
summary: Recently, Johnson Controls International (JCI) has experienced significant momentum, with its stock price surging 35% over the last quarter. The appointment of Chris Scalia as Executive Vice President and CHRO might have added confidence among investors regarding strategic HR leadership. This period also saw JCI approve a quarterly dividend and increase its equity buyback authorization significantly, which generally signals a strong financial position. headline: Johnson Controls Appoints Chris Scalia as Executive Vice President and Chief Human Resources Officer
summary: Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI), a global leader for smart, healthy and sustainable buildings, today announced the appointment of Chris Scalia as executive vice president and chief human resources officer (CHRO). Scalia will report to CEO Joakim Weidemanis and serve as a member of the company's executive committee.

thumbnail.caption: Chris Scalia has been appointed executive vice president and chief human resources officer (CHRO) of Johnson Controls. (PRNewsfoto/Johnson Controls International plc)
